DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether increase risk cardiovascular event ( CV ) regimens contain efavirenz ( EFV ) versus regimens patient HIV .
DOC.brief_title: Risk CV Events With EFV vs. EFV-free Regimens
DOC.criteria: For information regard BMS clinical trial participation , please visit www.BMSStudyConnect.com Aged 18 year old index date Have least one pharmacy claim efavirenz drug comparison cohort period span January 1 , 2007 December 31,2013 . Clinical Modification ( ICD9 ) diagnosis code HIV infection include 042 ( HIV disease ) , V08 ( asymptomatic HIV infection status ) , 795.71 ( nonspecific serologic evidence HIV ) , 079.53 ( HIV , type 2 ) time prior index claim . Have least 6 month ( 180 day ) continuous enrollment prior index claim Patients dispense antiretroviral medication anytime index date include 180day baseline period Patients evidence cardiovascular outcome interest 180day baseline period
